name: glcheck
description: A testing framework for WebGL 1 and 2 applications

scripts.test: npm run lint && ./glcheck && npm run test-full-config && npm run test-cli-args && npm run test-cli-equal-args
scripts.test-full-config: npm run with-full-config && test -d full-config-test/unit-tests && test -d .nyc_output && npm run with-full-config && test -e full-config-test/reference-images/test-render-render-test.html.png && rimraf full-config-test
scripts.with-cli-args: ./glcheck --clear-config --unit-test-dir cli-args-test/unit-tests --reference-image-dir cli-args-test/reference-images --reference-image-dir cli-args-test/reference-images --render-failure-dir cli-args-test/render-failures --save-render-failures=true --render-test-threshold 0.75 --server-port 5151 --asset-dir test/assets/ --coverage true --headless true --render-timeout 10000
scripts.test-cli-args: npm run with-cli-args && test -d cli-args-test/unit-tests  && test -d .nyc_output && npm run with-cli-args && test -e cli-args-test/reference-images/test-render-render-test.html.png && rimraf cli-args-test
scripts.test-cli-equal-args: npm run with-cli-equal-args && test -d cli-equal-args-test/unit-tests  && test -d .nyc_output && npm run with-cli-equal-args && test -e cli-equal-args-test/reference-images/test-render-render-test.html.png && rimraf cli-equal-args-test
